channel.title: [pi] npcs only killable once/don't reset after killed [pi]
channel.description:
hey guys, currently if i spawn and npc and kill it or if i kill and already added npc it die's and lays on the ground for 20 seconds. after that it goes back to a look alike normal but it doesn't move and you cannot attack it.
i don't get any errors on run.bat or compiler, im using pi base.
even if i use my npcreset command it still doesn't bring them back to moving around or being attackable.
please help

item.title: [pi] npcs only killable once/don't reset after killed [pi]
